Posts.EditableText:
If using the default help guide, the help window loads with focus.  The user can then close the help window without using the mouse by hitting the ESC key.

I have replaced the default help text with custom help.  The window loads properly, but does not have the focus.  This means that the user must use the mouse to close the help window.

Since the game has the focus, this means that the user can quit the game, and the help window will still be open.  This generates a RTE.

Is there a way to make the custom help window load with focus?

Also, is there a way to format the custom help text like the default help text?

Thanks in advance!
